Reviews.Title: “Very noisy and not so clean”
Reviews.Author: Kara2009
Reviews.Content: stayed suite home hotel istiklal 5 days wasnt experience noisy night failed help rest stay sleep ear plugs annoying despite reserving hotel mentioned weve floor facing istiklal noisiest busiest streets breakfast wasnt fabulous werent clean nice carpet dirty showers werent thoroughly cleaned breakfast amazing options bother definitely hotel

Reviews.Title: “Unexciting and overpriced. Clean your bathrooms!”

Reviews.Content: reserved top level roof deck surprised found roof deck spacious found chairs light table deck actually comfortable useful hotel clean numerous cigarette burns carpet pillow appeared addition shower deep scrubbing grout black breakfast included special youre looking heart istiklal location simply expected lot value price paid
